title: Pilot
episode_desc: A rival gang steals the Sons' stockpile of assault rifles, while Jax's ex-wife's drug overdose leads to an emergency c-section and life-threatening surgery for their baby.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Seeds
episode_desc: The club deals with the aftermath of their firearms warehouse attack as a new Deputy Chief of Police poses a new threat to SAMCRO.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Fun Town
episode_desc: When a daughter of a Charming family is assaulted during a carnival, SAMCRO seeks justice and races against authorities to capture the assailant.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Patch Over
episode_desc: SAMCRO travel to Nevada to store their firearms with a fellow MC. Meanwhile the Mayans pose to be another threat.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: The Pull
episode_desc: Samcro scrambles to raise cash as the IRA gun payment comes due. The Mayans and Nords take an extreme step to cement their alliance. And Jax finds himself in danger as his relationship with Tara deepens.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Hell Followed
episode_desc: SOA plans revenge on a rival biker club while hosting the wounded Cameron Hayes in the clubhouse. Meanwhile, Jax, Bobby, and Opie strive to clear the gun debt forever.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Better Half
episode_desc: As ATF agent Stahl pressures the women of SAMCRO, Jax looks to Chief Unser as the key to the club's freedom. Tara can't escape nightmares about Kohn. And Cherry reveals secrets about her past to Gemma.
show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

title: Capybara

show_desc: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

episode_desc: The club needs cash to fund Bobby's defense, but Clay's strategy leaves them in a vulnerable position. Abel comes home for the first time. But the homecoming party ends in tragedy.

In an effort to heal the tensions between her husband and son, Gemma organises a meal. Clay comes to an agreement with Oswald when he learns Jacob is planning to run for mayor. Chibs's estranged wife Fiona Larkin (Bellina Logan) shows up at his hospital bedside, much to Gemma's chagrin. Lin has a proposal for SAMCRO, who are surprised to learn Marstein is still alive. episode_desc: The entire SAMCRO family goes on lockdown inside the clubhouse as war with the League approaches. Opie decides not to pursue revenge against Clay or Tig for Donna's death. As Chibs backs out of the deal with Stahl and attempts to convince Fiona to let him protect her, Clay tells Jimmy that Edmond has flipped.
